title: What are the benefits of using live chat for customer support?
sub_title: Live chat improves customer satisfaction by providing instant responses. It also increases conversion rates and reduces support ticket volume. Companies using live chat report faster resolution times and higher customer retention rates.

title: How can I customize my Ai247 chat widget?
sub_title: You can easily change colors, position, and appearance of your chat widget from the Ai247 dashboard. Navigate to Settings > Chatbox to adjust branding elements like logo, bubble color, and welcome message to match your website’s design.

title: Does Ai247 support multiple languages?
sub_title: Yes! Ai247 automatically detects the visitor's browser language and displays the chat widget accordingly. You can also manually set supported languages and translate canned responses to provide a localized experience for your users.

title: How do I integrate Ai247 with Shopify?
sub_title: Adding Ai247 to your Shopify store is simple. Go to your Shopify admin, navigate to Online Store > Themes, click 'Edit code', and paste your Ai247 script in the theme.liquid file just before the closing </head> tag.

title: Can I use Ai247 on mobile apps?
sub_title: Ai247 offers mobile SDKs for both iOS and Android, allowing you to embed live chat directly into your native apps. This ensures your mobile users get the same high-quality support experience as your website visitors.

title: How do I set up automated responses in Ai247?
sub_title: Use Ai247’s canned messages and automation rules to save time. Go to Inbox > Canned Messages to create quick replies, or use Automation under Settings to trigger messages based on visitor behavior like page visits or idle time.

title: Is Ai247 GDPR compliant?
sub_title: Yes, Ai247 is fully GDPR compliant and provides tools to help you stay compliant, including cookie consent banners, data export/deletion requests, and privacy policy templates. All data is stored securely in EU-based servers.

title: How do I track visitor activity with Ai247?
sub_title: Ai247 automatically records visitor sessions, pages viewed, and interaction history. You can also send custom events using the JavaScript API to track specific user actions like button clicks or form submissions.

title: Can I assign chats to specific team members?
sub_title: Absolutely. Ai247 allows you to assign conversations to individual agents or teams. Use tags, priority labels, or rules to route chats automatically based on department, language, or customer type.

title: How do I export chat history from Ai247?
sub_title: You can export conversation logs as CSV or JSON from the Inbox section. Select the desired date range and filters, then click 'Export'. This is useful for compliance, audits, or customer service analytics.

title: What browsers does Ai247 support?
sub_title: Ai247 supports all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and Opera. The chat widget is responsive and works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices without any additional configuration.

title: How do I disable chat outside business hours?
sub_title: In Ai247, go to Settings > Chatbox > Availability to set your operating hours. Outside these hours, the chat widget can display a custom message like 'We’ll reply during business hours' or hide completely.

title: Can I use Ai247 with WordPress?
sub_title: Yes! You can add Ai247 to WordPress by installing the official Ai247 plugin from the WordPress plugin directory, or by manually adding the script to your theme’s header.php file.

title: How do I add team members to my Ai247 account?
sub_title: Go to Settings > Team Members and click 'Invite Member'. Enter their email and assign a role (Admin, Agent, or Viewer). They’ll receive an invitation link to join your workspace instantly.

title: Does Ai247 offer email support integration?
sub_title: Yes, Ai247 unifies email and chat in one inbox. Connect your support email address under Settings > Email Inbox, and all incoming emails will appear alongside live chats for seamless omnichannel support.

title: How secure is customer data in Ai247?
sub_title: Ai247 uses end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and strict access controls. All data is hosted in ISO 27001 certified data centers, ensuring your customers’ information remains private and protected at all times.

title: Can I use Ai247 without coding?
sub_title: Definitely! Ai247 is designed for non-developers. Just copy your unique script from the dashboard and paste it into your website’s HTML—no coding skills required. Many platforms like Wix, Squarespace, and Webflow have built-in support.

title: How do I create a knowledge base with Ai247?
sub_title: Ai247 includes a built-in Helpdesk feature where you can publish articles, FAQs, and guides. Customers can search this knowledge base before starting a chat, reducing repetitive inquiries and improving self-service.

title: What analytics does Ai247 provide?
sub_title: Ai247 offers real-time analytics on chat volume, response times, team performance, visitor engagement, and conversion tracking. Use these insights to optimize staffing, improve response quality, and boost customer satisfaction.
